name: 電子學實驗（一）
goals: Learning the basics of electronic circuits and systems.
Learning the techniques of implementing electronic circuits and systems.
Learning the design and application skills of electronic circuits and systems.
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction  
Week 2: \[Lab 1\] RLC Circuit (1/3)  
Week 3: \[Lab 1\] RLC Circuit (2/3)  
Week 4: \[Lab 1\] RLC Circuit (3/3)  
Week 5: \[Lab 2\] Operational Amplifier (1/3)  
Week 6: \[Lab 2\] Operational Amplifier (2/3)  
Week 7: \[Lab 2\] Operational Amplifier (3/3)  
Week 8: Midterm Exam  
Week 9: \[Lab 3\] Diode (1/3)  
Week 10: \[Lab 3\] Diode (2/3)  
Week 11: \[Lab 3\] Diode (3/3)  
Week 12: \[Lab 4\] Field-Effect Transistor (1/2)  
Week 13: \[Lab 4\] Field-Effect Transistor (2/2)  
Week 14: \[Lab 5\] FET Circuit (1/2)  
Week 15: \[Lab 5\] FET Circuit (2/2)  
Week 16: Final Exam  
(The arrangement may be adjusted according to the actual situation.)

methodologies.note: Describe the operating principles and procedures of electronic circuits.

grading.note: Testing of first half of semester.
Testing of second half of semester.
